title: Citizen Voting Age Population
text: primary tools package first download CVAP data ’s already processed. cvap_get() options available geographies Census special tabulation. data, can combine ACS Decennial Census data estimate block-level data. example purposes, 2010 Delaware Census block data provided: Along Delaware 2019 ACS data: allows us distribute block group data approximately blocks. workflow can also combined one function resulting data estimated CVAP data block: Thus, using packages like PL94171, can easily aggregate blocks VTDs, CVAP directly provided. vest_crosswalk allows download variant VEST’s crosswalk computationally favorable R.

what: Estimate CVAP at the Block Level — cvap_distribute
title: Estimate CVAP at the Block Level — cvap_distribute
text: Assuming citizenship homogeneity within block group race/ethnicity, estimates block groups block level, proportionally group possible, otherwise total population.

title: Estimate CVAP at the Block Level — cvap_distribute
Estimate CVAP at the Block Level — cvap_distribute
text: cvap cvap data block group level, using default settings get_cvap() block block data data Census () year cvap data wts 'pop' (default) 'vap' group distribute .

title: Estimate CVAP at the Block Level — cvap_distribute
text: cvap tibble estimated block level

title: Estimate CVAP at the Block Level — cvap_distribute
code: if (FALSE) { # Requires API set up with tidycensus state <- 'DE' cvap <- cvap_get(state) de_block <- censable::build_dec(geography = 'block', state = state, year = 2010, geometry = FALSE) } # Alternatively, using example data state <- 'DE' cvap <- cvap_get(state) data('de_block') cvap_block <- cvap_distribute(cvap, de_block)

what: Distribute CVAP at the Block Group and Download Data — cvap_distribute_censable
title: Distribute CVAP at the Block Group and Download Data — cvap_distribute_censable
text: Downloads CVAP, block data, block group data together. Calls cvap_distribute within.

title: Distribute CVAP at the Block Group and Download Data — cvap_distribute_censable
Distribute CVAP at the Block Group and Download Data — cvap_distribute_censable
text: state character. state get data nation nation file. year numeric. Year data 2009 2021. clean variable names standardized? Default TRUE. wts 'pop' (default) 'vap' group distribute .

title: Distribute CVAP at the Block Group and Download Data — cvap_distribute_censable
text: cvap tibble estimated block level

title: Distribute CVAP at the Block Group and Download Data — cvap_distribute_censable
code: if (FALSE) { # Requires API set up with tidycensus or censable cvap_distribute_censable('DE', 2019) }

what: Download Processed Citizen Voting Age Population Data — cvap_get
title: Download Processed Citizen Voting Age Population Data — cvap_get
text: Downloads processed CVAP data state. CVAP data rounded nearest 5 totals may sum properly, close.

title: Download Processed Citizen Voting Age Population Data — cvap_get
code: cvap_get(   state,   year = 2021,   geography = "block group",   out_file = NULL,   moe = FALSE,   clean = TRUE )

title: Download Processed Citizen Voting Age Population Data — cvap_get
text: state character. state get data nation nation file. year numeric. Year data 2009 2021. geography character. Level geography. Default 'block group'. See Details. out_file file save downloaded rds moe Include margin error? Default FALSE. clean variable names standardized? Default TRUE.

title: Download Processed Citizen Voting Age Population Data — cvap_get
text: tibble data

title: Download Processed Citizen Voting Age Population Data — cvap_get
text: Geography options 'block group': block group level data 'cd': congressional district data (years 2016+) 'county': county-level data 'place': place-level data shd': state house district data (years 2016+) 'ssd': state senate district data (years 2016+) 'state': state-level data 'tract': tract-level data 'nation': nation-wide data

title: Download Processed Citizen Voting Age Population Data — cvap_get

text: dir Path directory CVAP files year file year out_dir directory create files moe Boolean. Default TRUE. margin error kept? csv Boolean. Default FALSE, creates rds file instead.

text: list tibbles cvap

title: Process Directory of CVAP Files — cvap_process_dir

cvap 0.1.3
text: Adds support 2021 CVAP estimates. Default year updated 2021.

title: cvap 0.1.2
text: Adds support cvap_distribute() distribute ‘vap’. Default remains ‘pop’.

title: cvap 0.1.0
text: Adds support 2020 CVAP estimates Improves cvap_distribute() avoid population loss, following geomander::estimate_down() approach. Adds clean argument cvap_distribute_censable()

title: cvap 0.0.3
text: CRAN release: 2021-11-08 Added NEWS.md file track changes package. Fix logo link redirect
